official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel FIFTY ONE.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel for employment in the coastwise trade.
